import React, { Component } from 'react' import WrapComponents from '@/components/wrapper' import { ColoredButtons, TransparentButtons } from '@/components/button' import { SmallHeading } from '@/components/headings' import { Checkbox } from '@/components/checkBox' import Stepper from '@/components/stepper' import './index.scss' class StepTwo extends Component { state = { steps: ['Channel', 'Message', 'Segmentation', 'Scheduling', 'Overview'], tittle: '', message: '', } render() { const { steps, tittle, message } = this.state return (
<> Tittle this.props.handleInputFields('tittle', e.target.value) } /> <> Message this.props.handleInputFields('message', e.target.value) } /> Continue Save as Draft
right section of message
 ) } } export default StepTwo
